title: Cycling the words
description: Given a line contains N words, print the N lines. The first line is the same as the input. After printing each line, the first word of this line in put to the end of the next line.
input: A line contains N words seperated by one blank. N is not given in the problem: you need to count the number of words in the input line to find it out. The line contains less than 100 characters.
output:
N lines.
The first line equals the input.
For the rest N-1 lines, the first word in a line in put to the end in the next line. There is one space between words.
sample_output:
Please think about it carefully
think about it carefully Please
about it carefully Please think
it carefully Please think about
carefully Please think about it
author: 程序设计II Chapter 9 Objects and Class
